posts.name: Pete Walters
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.71 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • Persistence pays off, but it’s even better when things work on the first try. We fixed a bug that sometimes required multiple attempts in order to send a sticker from the iOS emoji keyboard. The same fix also works for Genmoji too, so we hope you Genjoy it.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.70 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.71.0.914-beta

55 new commits since 7.70.0.910-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.71 [1]

  • Fix URLError.cancelled check to include the domain [2]

  • Clean up GroupManager/InfoMessagePolicy [3]

  • Show backup restore progress during registration [4]

  • Don't clear input text bar when we send a sticker [5]

  • Remove most TestableFlags [6]

  • Remove unused logCurlOnSuccess [7]

  • Fix “warnings as errors” in Debug builds [8]

  • Fetch “Your Account Data” via the web socket [9]

  • Asyncify CaptchaChallenge & PushChallenge [10]

  • Fix warnings [11]

  • Fix attachment multisend use of AttachmentContentValidator [12]

  • Explicitly pass in backup keys to backup operations [13]

  • Create missing MRBK during orphan backup attachment check [14]

  • Backup Download progress only updates on first download per app launch [15]

  • unbork xcode 26 again [16]

  • Asyncify registration permissions handling [17]

  • Stickers don't send [18]

  • Asyncify syncContacts methods [19]

  • Remove unused makePromise method [20]

  • Asyncify SystemStoryManager [21]

  • Asyncify push notification registration code [22]

  • Remove shouldReconnectIfConnectedElsewhere [23]

  • Make the final setup contacts method run on main thread in all cases. [24]

  • Don't back up oversized text attachments [25]

  • Update iOS 26 navigation bar style [26]

  • Revert temporary iOS 26 tab bar fix [27]

  • Rewrite country code picker in SwiftUI [28]

  • Use NetworkManager for non-registration requests [29]

  • Make AttachmentContentValidator async [30]

  • Remove a owsFailDebug for a situation that's expected to happen during reg [31]

  • Asyncify nextStepForProfileSetup & friends [32]

  • Use Retry.performWithBackoff for a few requests [33]

  • Asyncify waiting for push tokens [34]

  • Move PIN entry during backup restore after the backup steps [35]

  • Throw a specific error when the app is expired [36]

  • Fix push-related registration test flakiness [37]

  • Fix cell swipe actions on iOS 26 [38]

  • open device transfer pane when QR code scanned from system camera [39]

  • Remove action sheet for quick restore from in-app camera [40]

  • Throw a specific error when not registered [41]

  • Stop storing arbitrary send failures [42]

  • Asyncify registration prekey shims [43]

  • Remove the UI choice for local backup restore [44]

  • Replace two comments with “use web socket” checks [45]

  • Update comment about registration & web sockets [46]

  • Remove outdated comments about cancellation [47]

  • Fix backup attachment upload network retrying [48]

  • Strip out most of DebugUI [49]

  • Remove anyRemoveAllWithInstantiation [50]

  • Inline oversize text in backups [51]

  • Playing a voice message while other content is AirPlaying crashes the app [52]

  • Update to libsignal 0.77.1 [53]

  • Update release notes [54]

  • Update translations [55]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.70.0.910-beta…7.71.0.914-beta
